headline: ADIXEN COMPACT HIGH PERFORMANCE HELIUM LEAK DETECTOR
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Helium Leak Detectors
specstable:
Manufacturer Adixen
Model ASM 182 T
High Vacuum Pump Type Turbomolecular Pump
Roughing Pump Capacity 423.86 l/m (15.00 CFM)
Inlet Port for Auxiliary Pump No
Test Port Connection KF40
Helium Pumping Speed at Inlet 4.40 l/s (9.32 CFM)
Remote Control Capabilities Yes
Interface RS 232
Internal Calibrated Leak Included
Built-In Roughing Pump Included
Other Information

Measurement range: 5E-12 to 1E-1 mbar.l/s

Auto calibration with internal calibrated leak
Auto zero
Full automation fo test cycle including: cycle sequence, memorization of last test, test result display.

Part No. D20RS00PB710

Remote control pendant is not included but can be purchased directly from the OEM.

Extended Description Details at 182T specifications.pdf
Power Requirements 110/120 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2011
Exterior Dimensions
Width 23.400 in (59.4 cm)
Depth 18.100 in (46.0 cm)
Height 18.000 in (45.7 cm)
Weight 176 lb (80 kg)
